  • Constructor Details

    • SuggesterSpec

      public SuggesterSpec(org.opensearch.core.ParseField name, org.opensearch.common.io.stream.Writeable.Reader<T> builderReader, org.opensearch.common.CheckedFunction<org.opensearch.core.xcontent.XContentParser,T,IOException> builderParser, org.opensearch.common.io.stream.Writeable.Reader<? extends org.opensearch.search.suggest.Suggest.Suggestion> suggestionReader)
      Specification of custom Suggester.
      Parameters:
      name - holds the names by which this suggester might be parsed. The ParseField.getPreferredName() is special as it is the name by under which the request builder and Suggestion response readers are registered. So it is the name that the query and Suggestion response should use as their NamedWriteable.getWriteableName() return values too. It is an error if ParseField.getPreferredName() conflicts with another registered name, including names from other Extensions.
      builderReader - the reader registered for this suggester's builder. Typically, a reference to a constructor that takes a StreamInput
      builderParser - a parser that reads the suggester's builder from xcontent
      suggestionReader - the reader registered for this suggester's Suggestion response. Typically, a reference to a constructor that takes a StreamInput

    • SuggesterSpec

      public SuggesterSpec(String name, org.opensearch.common.io.stream.Writeable.Reader<T> builderReader, org.opensearch.common.CheckedFunction<org.opensearch.core.xcontent.XContentParser,T,IOException> builderParser, org.opensearch.common.io.stream.Writeable.Reader<? extends org.opensearch.search.suggest.Suggest.Suggestion> suggestionReader)
      Specification of custom Suggester.
      Parameters:
      name - the name by which this suggester might be parsed or deserialized. Make sure that the query builder and Suggestion response reader return this name for NamedWriteable.getWriteableName(). It is an error if this name conflicts with another registered name, including names from other Extensions.
      builderReader - the reader registered for this suggester's builder. Typically, a reference to a constructor that takes a StreamInput
      builderParser - a parser that reads the suggester's builder from xcontent
      suggestionReader - the reader registered for this suggester's Suggestion response. Typically, a reference to a constructor that takes a StreamInput
